lom:description.lom:string: This radio series explores the wonders of science found in our everyday lives, and is dedicated to advancing science literacy across the United States. Topics cover a broad spectrum, from insects to how things work. The user can search by keyword or radio show title, or even find a radio station nearby that broadcasts the show. Show titles include: Why is Mars red?, What causes a tornado?, Fault Line, and La Nina. Also included is a Fun Stuff section with activities for the home or classroom.
